meta.project: Med Attorneys Online Case Management System

product_overview: A secure, modular web platform that digitizes client interactions for Med Attorneys, enabling case management, service requests, and administrative workflows with role-based access and integrated notifications.
core_goals: Enable clients to register, authenticate, and manage their legal cases digitally.
Provide clients with the ability to request and track legal services throughout the lifecycle of a case.
Allow administrators to oversee cases, approve service requests, manage users, and monitor system health.
Ensure secure handling of sensitive data and documents with robust authentication and CSRF protection.
Incorporate a transparent service cart system that persists for the duration of a case and facilitates fee calculations upon case resolution.
Offer a responsive, accessible user interface compatible with desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Deliver reporting and analytics features for performance monitoring and decision support.
key_features: Complete user authentication system with registration, login, password reset, and CSRF protection.
Client dashboard displaying case overviews, messaging, notifications, and statistics.
Full case management including creation, editing, status updates, and progress tracking.
Service catalog with the ability to add services (consultations, doctor visits, transportation) to case-specific carts.
Administrator dashboard to approve or reject service requests, update case statuses, and calculate contingency fees upon case win.
Secure document upload and management related to cases.
Appointment scheduling system for client-attorney meetings.
Internal messaging system to facilitate client-attorney communication.
System-wide notifications with email integration for key updates and alerts.
User profile and settings management with role-based access control.
Reports and analytics modules for monitoring case outcomes and service usage.
Frontend designed using Bootstrap 5.3, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript for a responsive experience.
Back-end powered by PHP and MySQL with secure file handling and database management.
Admin features including user management, service management, messaging, system monitoring, and detailed reporting.
user_flow_summary: User registration and login flow with secure credentials validation and session management.
Clients create or select active cases, upload relevant documents, and add services to their case cart.
Service requests are created and submitted for admin approval.
Admins review pending requests, approve or deny them, and update case statuses.
Clients receive notifications via email and dashboard alerts about service approvals, case status changes, and settlements.
Upon case settlement, the system calculates fees and triggers payment processes.
Admin users manage all system data, generate reports, and monitor analytics through the admin dashboard.
The system provides responsive navigation and views tailored to device type (desktop, tablet, mobile).
validation_criteria: Users can successfully register, log in, reset passwords, and securely access their dashboards.
Clients can create cases, upload documents, and manage their case progress.
Service catalog is accessible and allows adding services to a persistent case cart.
Admins can approve or reject service requests and update case statuses accordingly.
Fee calculation on case wins is correctly computed as 25% of compensation and reflected in the system.
Email notifications are sent appropriately on important events such as approvals and case updates.
Role-based access controls restrict clients and admin users to their permitted system areas.
System UI is fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices as verified by visual wireframes.
Reports and analytics generate accurate data reflecting service usage and case outcomes.
Security features such as CSRF protection and secure file upload prevent unauthorized access and data breaches.
All core workflows including booking services, managing cases, and reporting work end-to-end without errors.
